menu.hub.header.ride: Vyber si trasu, kterou pojedete svým vlastním tempem
menu.hub.header.pace: Vyber si robota s kterým pojedeš
menu.hub.header.events: Select an event to ride with, or race against, others from across the world
menu.hub.header.challenges: Check your progress in {0}'s challenges - {1} {2} remaining
menu.hub.header.profile: Review and update your player profile
menu.hub.sort.name: Sort by Name
menu.login.createnewalreadyexists: An account for address {0} already exists.
menu.login.error: indieVelo is currently unable to validate your login details. Please try again later.
menu.login.recovery: Select reset to send an account recovery email to:
menu.login.recoverycheck: Please check your email for details on how to reset the password for your account.
menu.login.recoverydelay: For security reasons, this may take up to 1 hour to arrive.
menu.login.remembermefailed: Could not log in to remembered account.
menu.login.remembermefailedreason: This is usually because the account is currently being remembered on a different device, and for security reasons, it has been deliberately forgotten on this device.
menu.login.remembermefailedtryagain: Please try logging in again using your email address and password.
menu.login.welcomeinstructions: Please enter your email address, and a password with 12 or more characters.
menu.profileftp.welcome: Functional Threshold Power (FTP) is the maximum power that you can produce for 1 hour.  This is a useful measure of your strength and fitness.  indieVelo uses it to help set the difficulty of workouts, and provide visual feedback on how hard you are working.
menu.profileftp.welcomeestimate: If you do not already know what your FTP is, please use the following as a rough estimate.
menu.profileftp.welcomeinstructions: To begin with, it is better to estimate too low, rather than too high.
menu.profileprivate.welcome: Your profile will be visible to other users and is used to determine your speed in game.
menu.profileprivate.welcomeinstructions: Please give accurate and up to date information to ensure realistic results.
menu.team.welcome: Optionally, you may request to join one or more of indieVelo's many teams.
menu.team.welcomeinstructions: Email help@indievelo.com to create and manage your own new team.
menu.worldchat.block: Permanently block messages from this person for this, and all future, sessions.  Also prevents them from seeing your messages, joining you or following you.
menu.worldchat.mute: Temporarily mute messages from this person for just the rest of this session.
menu.worldoptions.header.analysis: Examine how your power, cadence and heartrate varied over the ride
menu.worldoptions.header.resultsprovisio: Results So Far - {0} Still To Finish
